title: Southwest Community Associates: "From the Heart: Thought in Color" and "Mayan Kings as the Living Maize God"
hero_caption: Vessel of the Dancing Lords, A.D. 750/800. Ah Maxam, Late Classic Maya, Vicinity of Naranjo, Petén region, Guatemala. Ethel T. Scarborough Fund.
description:
Join local artist Valerie Weberpal, who guides us through her art studio named "The Crib." The building is an early 20th-century corn crib that was refurbished into an art studio in 2015. Much of Weberpal's work is done in a colorful folk art style.

After lunch, Elizabeth Pope, the Art Institute's collections manager for Arts of Africa and the Americas, leads a lecture sharing beautiful images of Mayan kings, dressed in lustrous jade beads and Quetzal feathers, who represented the living gods that brought maize to earth.

Schedule of the Day

8:30—Bus pick up at Big Lots in Peru, IL

9:00—Bus pick up at Farm and Fleet in Ottawa, IL

9:30—Bus pick up at Brother's Country Store in Morris, IL

10:30–11:45—Lecture by Valerie Weberpal at The Crib, located at 16521 Swanson Road, Sycamore, IL 60178

12:20–1:30 —Lunch at Aqua Viva Vineyards, located at 47 W 614 Route, Maple Park, IL 60151

1:40–3:00—Lecture by Elizabeth Pope at Aqua Viva Vineyards

3:30 —Bus departs

Registration Period: April 18, 2019–May 2, 2019

To contact the event planner, please reach out to Deborah Torri at (815) 941-9767, (815) 830-3486 debroadway3@aol.com. You can also reach out to the event registration contact, Barbara Mueller, at (815) 434-5218, (815) 210-1152, or bmueller51@yahoo.com.

This Community Associates event is exclusively for current Community Associates members. Membership will be verified at the door, and refunds cannot be issued for those without a valid membership. For Community Associates events that allow guests, nonmember guests must be registered by a Community Associates member.

If you are interested in becoming a member of Community Associates, please visit artic.edu/joinnow to join both the Art Institute of Chicago and the Community Associates group of your choice.
location: The Crib, Sycamore, IL and Aqua Viva Vineyards, located in Maple Parks, IL
